animeTitle: Hundreds of Millions of Apprentices Are Returned: This Master Is Invincible in the World
otherNames: Shou Tu Yi Wan Fanhuan: Wei Shi Wudi Shijian, Hundreds of Millions of Apprentices Are Returned: This Master Is Invincible in the World, Shōu Tú Yì Wàn Fǎnhuán: Wéi Shī Wúdí Shìjiān, 收徒亿万返还：为师无敌世间
synopsis: Ding! You teach your apprentice the eighth set of radio gymnastics, triggering a billion-fold return to get the god-level exercise Taixuan magic exercise! ” “Ding! You give your apprentice a yellow magic weapon, triggering a million times return to get the magic weapon! ” “Ding! You give ten low-grade spirit stones to your apprentice, trigger ten thousand times return and get 100,000 middle-grade spirit stones! ” “Disciple, today I will give you the holy artifact, the Heavenly Waterfall Sword, as my teacher!” ” “Master, how about you?” ” “I’ll do whatever I want!” “Bai Yu took out the Hongmeng magic weapon that will be returned after a million times critical strike
